channel.title: 2 Questions... D-Bow Question and NPC Question
channel.description:
Black Demon Question: Well... Whenever you hit a Black Demon on my server (ID = 677) it drops 15k coins (995) and i want it to drop like 50k WHEN IT DIES, not whenever it's hit. I know how to change the amount it drops, so I'm good with that, but how do i make it drop when it's killed?
Dark Bow Question: My dark bow hits ONCE each time, i want it to fire twice. Also, when you use the special it hits ONCE but shoots two arrows, how could i make it hit TWICE with both the special and regular?
Help is greatly appreciated!

item.title: 2 Questions... D-Bow Question and NPC Question
item.dc:creator: @watch_n_lern watch n lern
item.description:
@watch_n_lern wrote:

[quote=“PushedPrawn, post:7, topic:303247”][quote author=project fallout link=topic=399491.msg2963285#msg2963285 date=1253393303]

if(specOn){ if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4827 && specialAmount > 74){ specialAtkNPC(true, 75, 250, 1074); hitDiff = misc.random(maxRangeHit()); hitDiff = misc.random(maxRangeHit()); rangeGFXNPC(85, 643); rangeGFXNPC(65, 643); }

try this
[/quote]

The dark bow’s hitting ONCE on the special still but it’s hitting twice each regular attack.

Any more ideas?[/quote]

first off with black demon search 15000 in client.java and change it to 50000. and for dark bow search the dark bows item id, whatever it is in client.java and find “special amount” and udner it should say like “75” change it to 50.

Read full topic
item.source: 2 Questions... D-Bow Question and NPC Question

item.title: 2 Questions... D-Bow Question and NPC Question
item.dc:creator: @PushedPrawn PushedPrawn
item.description:
@PushedPrawn wrote:

if(specOn){
if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4827 && specialAmount > 74){
specialAtkNPC(true, 75, 250, 1074);
hitDiff = misc.random(maxRangeHit());
rangeGFXNPC(85, 643);
rangeGFXNPC(65, 643);
}

I think that’s it… The ID is correct, according to my Item.CFG.

Read full topic

item.title: 2 Questions... D-Bow Question and NPC Question
item.dc:creator: @PushedPrawn PushedPrawn
item.description:
@PushedPrawn wrote:

[quote=“project fallout, post:2, topic:303247”]BD question:

find where your server drops the coins, its most likel in the wrong spot.

DB question:

loop the hit method 2x in the special, won’t have any delay, but it will hit 2x[/quote]

I’m going to start with the Dark Bow first, thanks for your help!

Alright, any idea what i might want to search for the dark bow hit method? I didn’t add the Dark bow to the server, I’m just trying to fix it a little.

If you could tell me that, GREAT! If not, thanks for trying. I’ll take some guesses.

Read full topic
